title: PBR Plant Pack Volume 3
description: PBR Plant Pack Volume 3 contains 10 types of plants with 10 unique meshes per plant for a total of 100 plant meshes. All materials are fully PBR (base color,normal,metallic/roughness, and AO) with max resolution textures of 4096x4096.
longDescription:
PBR Plant Pack Volume 3 was created by taking high resolution leaf and stem scans using a 1600dpi CCD scanner. Alpha masks and careful touch ups of dust/dirt/scratches was done on the scanned leaves. The asset includes base color, normal, metallic/roughness, and ambient occlusion textures for its PBR materials. Additionally each material has been modified to enable subsurface scattering for a more realistic vegetation appearance.

This package contains 10 plant varieties with 10 unique meshes per plant. In total there are 100 unique plant meshes. All textures have a max resolution of 4096x4096. All meshes have 8-260 polygons (triangles) per plant. There is an average of 151 polygons (triangles) per plant mesh.

Material instances are provided to allow for easy modification to normal strength, roughness value, metallic value, subsurface color, and subsurface opacity.
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes
Physically-Based Rendering: Yes
Texture Size (please list textures for each resolution): 4096x4096: 40 textures (base colour, normal, metal/roughness, ambient occlusion)
Collision: Yes, automatically generated.
Vertex Count: 16 to 468
LODs: LOD0
Number of Meshes: 100
Number of Materials and Material Instances: 10 Materials + 10 Material Instances
Number of Textures: 40
Engine Compatibility: 4.13.2 and up
Intended Platform:PC
Platforms Tested: PC
Documentation Included: No
Important\Additional Notes: None
